name: Massacre At The Mirage
storyline:
From the moment you enter it's up to you: Can you outsmart the killer? Or will you be just another part of the bloody set of our theater? This Halloween, the Mirage is going to make you a horrible offer you can't refuse!
It'll be short, it'll be not-so-sweet - and it'll make you question your choice of movie theaters!

Join us for an unforgettable Halloween spectacle of terror – we're dying to have you!
summary: In our traditional and charming movie theater "The Mirage", we've got more than just popcorn and sticky floors to make you scream! Step into the shoes of various characters – be it the overworked staff or the unsuspecting movie buffs – prepare for a night of horror you'll never forget!
